dmca.title: Notice of Intent:DIRECT COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT and theft of Copyrighted Material
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: James Bond [mailto:james_bond76002@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Friday, May 20, 2005 4:10 AM
To: Nemohosting; karl@nemohosting.com
Subject: Notice of Intent:DIRECT COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT and theft of
Copyrighted Material


Paradise City Partnership Inc. 
DBA:Paradise City Models Promtions L.L.C.
Owner of: http://www.crowsmodels.com 
                 vs
DEFENDANT(S):
Kevin & Anne Cooper
Karl Steiger

DBA:NEMOHOSTING
(http://www.nemohosting.com)
COMES NOW Paradise City Partnership Inc DBA:Paradise City Models Promotions
L.L.C.
TO HAVE A  JUDGE GRANT US THE RIGHT TO TERMINATE THE WEBSITE
http://www.nemohosting.com (NemoHosting) FOR DIRECT COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT 
AND THEFT OF COPYRIGHTED MATERIAL.and  AWARD Paradise City Partnership Inc.
and it's Owners/Operators a SUM OF NO LESS THAN $20,000 DOLLARS IN DAMAGES 
AND FOREVER BAR THE REOPENING OF ANY WEBSITE BY THE DEFENDANT(S)
 
***********************************************************************
Here is the origional e-mail sent earlier today:
From:Legal@crowsmodels.com
TO:kevin_cooper@nemohosting.com
Subject: Your commision of a Felony Offence-Theft of Copyrighted Material
Attention Nemo Hosting
You are stealing  COPYRIGHTED MATERIAL without concent of the Owners of 
the Copyrighted Material.by Disabling access to a Website
(http://www.crowsmodels.com)
for supposed (NON EXISTANT) Terms of Service Violations.
We exclusively Own http://www.crowsmodels.com You do not have the right to
lock our site
nor have you ever had the right to access or tamper with any content of said
site
 if You DO NOT restore Our access to the COPYRIGHTED 
MATERIAL IMMEDIATELY. We the Owner's of said Material will not only 
Notify the local police and FBI of your intended INFRINGEMENT AND THEFT
.We will seek Criminal and Civil Charges against ALL OWNER'S and staff of
this hosting service.

COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT is a FELONY Offense.

Below is Your INFRINGEMEMENT:

On or Before May 19 2005 You deliberately in violation OF copyright 
TAMPERED WITH MATERIAL OWNED exclusively by 
Paradise City Partnership Inc DBA:Paradise City Models Promotions L.L.C 
IT IS OUR INTENT TO RECOVER OUR EXPENSES INCURRED BY 
YOUR DEFRAUDING OUR CORPORATION. BY TAMPERING WITH OUR EXCLUSIVELY 
HELD COPYRIGHTED MATERIAL WE INTEND TO RECOVER THE COSTS ASSOCIATED 
WITH DESIGN NO LESS THAN $20,000.00 US DOLLARS MAXIMUM AMOUNT 
OF $500,000.00 US DOLLARS.YOU ARE SERVED WITH THIS ELECTRONIC NOTICE 
OF OUR INTENT TO SUE YOU BY E-MAIL ON May 20 2005. 
****************************************************************************
************************
The Planet(Server Matrix) and Go-Daddy.com  have been notified of this
violation 
and both have agreed to be bound by ANY court Order obtained concerning NEMO
HOSTING
We have full intention of seeking SUSPENSION  of http://www.nemohosting.com
and seek to have NemoHosting awarded to us for Damages

***********************************************************************
THIS MESSAGE IS YOUR FINAL AND FORMAL WARNING !
OF OUR INTENT TO FILE CRIMINAL AND CIVIL ACTION AGAINST YOU.
ANY INFORMATION COLLECTED CAN AND WILL BE USED AGAINST YOU DO NOT DISREGAURD
THIS NOTICE.
 

 

__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around 
http://mail.yahoo.com
dmca.principal_name: James Bond (Paradise City Models Promotions L.L.C.)
